item.title: Lanie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Sean Mangan
item.description: "Life is too short when you think of the length of death" -- Sean Mangan

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Norman Cousins
item.description: "Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live." -- Norman Cousins

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "Death is contagious; it is contracted the moment we are conceived." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "Death, taxes and childbirth! There's never any convenient time for any of them." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "It’s not contagious, you know. Death is as natural as life. It’s part of the deal we made." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "If flowers were boogers, I'd pick a few big ones and flick them on your grave." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Cecelia Ahern
item.description: "Believe me, when you die, it's everybody else's but your problem" -- Cecelia Ahern

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "YOU FEAR TO DIE? "It's not that I don't want... I mean, I've always...it's just that life is a habit that's hard to break..." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Lanie add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "So, have a little fun. Soon enough you'll be dead and burning in Hell with the rest of your family." -- George Carlin

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Goldie Hawn
item.description: "If we can just let go and trust that things will work out they way they're supposed to, without trying to control the outcome, then we can begin to enjoy the moment more fully. The joy of the freedom it brings becomes more pleasurable than the experience itself." -- Goldie Hawn

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The last thing I ever wanted was to be alive when the three most powerful people on the whole planet would be named Bush, Dick and Colon." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Goldie Hawn
item.description: "The lotus is the most beautiful flower, whose petals open one by one. But it will only grow in the mud. In order to grow and gain wisdom, first you must have the mud --- the obstacles of life and its suffering. ... The mud speaks of the common ground that humans share, no matter what our stations in life. ... Whether we have it all or we have nothing, we are all faced with the same obstacles: sadness, loss, illness, dying and death. If we are to strive as human beings to gain more wisdom, more kindness and more compassion, we must have the intention to grow as a lotus and open each petal one by one. " -- Goldie Hawn

item.title: Lanie add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Religion is like a pair of shoes.....Find one that fits for you, but don't make me wear your shoes." -- George Carlin

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Epicurus
item.description: "Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for." -- Epicurus

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Vanzant
item.description: "If you want to hear God laugh, tell Him your plans." -- Vanzant

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Children are happy because they don't have a file in their minds called "All the Things That Could Go Wrong." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Where there is lack, God’s abundance is on the way. Hold on. Have faith. It’s coming." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment" -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Warning: If you are reading this then this warning is for you. Every word you read of this useless fine print is another second off your life. Don't you have other things to do? Is your life so empty that you honestly can't think of a better way to spend these moments? Or are you so impressed with authority that you give respect and credence to all that claim it? Do you read everything you're supposed to read? Do you think every thing you're supposed to think? Buy what you're told to want? Get out of your apartment. Meet a member of the opposite sex. Stop the excessive shopping and masturbation. Quit your job. Start a fight. Prove you're alive. If you don't claim your humanity you will become a statistic. You have been warned." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Kaui Hart Hemmings
item.description: "Why is it so hard to articulate love yet so easy to express disappointment?" -- Kaui Hart Hemmings

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "We can always choose to perceive things differently. We can focus on what's wrong in our life, or we can focus on what's right." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Lanie add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Whenever we feel lost, or insane, or afraid, all we have to do is ask for His help. The help might not come in the form we expected, or even thought we desired, but it will come, and we will recognize it by how we feel. In spite of everything, we will feel at peace." -- Marianne Williamson
